DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate pain, anxiety and depression in patients with panic anxiety disorders without pain or depression without pain compared with healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Pain Processing in Anxiety and Depression
DOC.criteria: Patients with panic disorder or depression Treatment with antidepressants, anticonvulsants or any other pain medication except paracetamol, SSRI and benzodiazepines Serious or unstable medical disease Prior or present diagnosis of mania, bipolar or psychotic disorder, delirium, suicidal, drug and alcohol dependence, severe agitation Patients who cannot cooperate and do not understand Danish
